data.name: BoltBreak Demo
data.detailed_description: In BoltBreak you will take on 100s of SuperPowered Enemies alone as you fight in the Super Arena, gifted the powers of the gods it is up to you to decide how to defeat the villains and survive the arena. Will you slow time and punch the villains to death at superspeed or will you create a sonic clap that will decimate the villains where they stand, the choice is yours!
data.about_the_game: In BoltBreak you will take on 100s of SuperPowered Enemies alone as you fight in the Super Arena, gifted the powers of the gods it is up to you to decide how to defeat the villains and survive the arena. Will you slow time and punch the villains to death at superspeed or will you create a sonic clap that will decimate the villains where they stand, the choice is yours!
data.short_description: In BoltBreak, you will fight enemies who share powers similar to yours, and you will have to use your own powers creatively to be the last hero standing! Do you have what it takes to survive the Super Arena?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
